div.a: The Surreal Story Of A Football Star's Fake Dead Girlfriend

div.div: Holy crap. RT @ECStoner: WTF WTF WTF WTF WTF deadspin.com/5976517/manti-teo... #RollCatfish

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W7IciR&via=Digg&text=The Surreal Story Of A Football Star's Fake Dead Girlfriend

div.a: Football Star With Fake Girlfriend Makes Statement

div.div: "To realize that I was the victim of what was apparently someone's sick joke and constant lies was, and is, painful and humiliating."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U20YtD&via=Digg&text=Football Star With Fake Girlfriend Makes Statement

div.div: Each December for the past fifteen years, the literary agent John Brockman has pulled out his Rolodex and asked a legion of top scientists and writers to ponder a single question. This year he asked, "What should we be worried about?"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/1084vun&via=Digg&text=What We Should Fear

div.a: Photos Of Everyday Things Frozen Over

div.div: It might be cold where you are, but these photos of frozen cars, beards and more will make you glad you're indoors and by the space heater, sipping a hot chocolate, while the outside world freezes over.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10zMCWt&via=Digg&text=Photos Of Everyday Things Frozen Over

div.a: Kid Sends Perfectly Blunt Cover Letter For Wall Street Internship

div.div: "I won't waste your time inflating my credentials, throwing around exaggerated job titles, or feeding you a line of crap about how my past experiences and skill set align perfectly for an investment banking internship. The truth is I have no unbelievably special skills or genius eccentricities..."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WI7YsC&via=Digg&text=Kid Sends Perfectly Blunt Cover Letter For Wall Street Internship

div.a: The 'Fresh Prince' Theme With Lyrics By Google Translate

div.div: In the geekiest experiment ever, CDZA co-founder Joe Sabia shows us what happens when we translate the lyrics of the Fresh Prince of Bel-Air through every language in Google Translate (64 times), and then taking what remains and translating it BACK into English.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYwhWH&via=Digg&text=The 'Fresh Prince' Theme With Lyrics By Google Translate

div.a: Here's What Happened The Last Time The U.S. Defaulted On Its Debt

div.div: Once upon a time, Congress didn't want to raise the debt ceiling, and sent the country into default. It was bad, and we shouldn't do it again. The end.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10z5BQP&via=Digg&text=Here's What Happened The Last Time The U.S. Defaulted On Its Debt

div.div: The FAA will soon order US airlines to temporarily stop flying the Boeing 787 Dreamliner due to concerns about the fire potential of the plane’s batteries.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SMrLvG&via=Digg&text=FAA Grounds Boeing's New Dreamliner

div.div: THE PLACE REALLY NEEDS A WOMAN'S TOUCH

div.a: An Oil Town Where Men Are Many, And Women Are Hounded

div.div: "It’s bad, dude. I was talking to my buddy here. I told him I was going to import from Indiana because there’s nothing here.”

div.a: The 'Xtreme Eating' List Will Kill You

div.div: That a Cheesecake Factory pasta – PASTA! – dish is loaded with 3,120 calories is really all you need to know about the state of food in America.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U0l3QT&via=Digg&text=The 'Xtreme Eating' List Will Kill You

div.a: The White House Gun Violence Page Is An Astonishing Bit Of HTML5

div.div: The White House has released a gorgeous new site to go along with its new gun control plan.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13E0fBN&via=Digg&text=The White House Gun Violence Page Is An Astonishing Bit Of HTML5

div.a: Lance Armstrong's Last Legacy Is A Content Farm

div.div: His career is over, and his reputation in shambles. But Livestrong.com, a health and fitness website founded with his support, surges on.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VKrJ6X&via=Digg&text=Lance Armstrong's Last Legacy Is A Content Farm

div.a: I'm Mentally Ill, I Love Violent Video Games, And I've Never Felt Like Killing Anyone

div.div: "I can't listen to conversations about mental illness and violent video games—all the speculation that those games could inspire the mentally ill to commit these atrocities—and not think that these people are also talking about me."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XDF4fQ&via=Digg&text=I'm Mentally Ill, I Love Violent Video Games, And I've Never Felt Like Killing Anyone

div.div: It’s been a long, strange journey for the spire at 1WTC, but the first of 18 pieces has finally been installed on the top of the mammoth building.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10zH7aj&via=Digg&text=Watch Construction Workers Install 1WTC's Spire

div.div: Looper. You either loved it or hated it. Or, if you're like these guys, you wrote down a list of sins you found in the film and then made a video documenting them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W5Ntqk&via=Digg&text=This Is Everything Wrong With 'Looper'

div.div: WHEN POKING JUST DOESN'T CUT IT

div.a: Facebook Launches Free Calling For All U.S. iPhone Users

div.div: In early January, Facebook began testing free calling over Wi-Fi and cellular data for all Messenger for iPhone users in Canada, and said that a US launch could be coming soon. Apparently, the test went well — a new free calling button has appeared in the app.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10d3nFP&via=Digg&text=Facebook Launches Free Calling For All U.S. iPhone Users

div.a: How To Stop Sexual Assault At Military Service Academies: First, Legalize Sex

div.div: It's impossible to teach young officers-in-training what's wrong with unwanted sex when even consensual sex is against the rules.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vl257B&via=Digg&text=How To Stop Sexual Assault At Military Service Academies: First, Legalize Sex

div.a: Meet The Man Who Lived And Worked In North Korea For Seven Years

div.div: Swiss born Felix Abt recently spent seven years living and working in North Korea and provides an inside look at what life was like raising a family in Pyongyang and how sanctions effect the daily lives of ordinary North Koreans.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wdg8uk&via=Digg&text=Meet The Man Who Lived And Worked In North Korea For Seven Years

div.a: Churro Waffles Are Quite Possibly The Best Thing To Ever Happen To Breakfast

div.div: For those who’ve never been to a theme park, state fair or any other such junk-food laden mecca of everything that still makes this nation great, listen up: churros are sex. Deep fried, cinnamon-coated, gloriously phallic sex. And now you can have them for breakfast.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UtykQT&via=Digg&text=Churro Waffles Are Quite Possibly The Best Thing To Ever Happen To Breakfast

div.a: These Are Congress' Favorite Movies To Download On BitTorrent

div.div: It turns out that digital copies of pirated movies and TV shows aren't just the subject of committee debates on Capitol Hill—they're also being downloaded onto Capitol Hill computers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TZeSfP&via=Digg&text=These Are Congress' Favorite Movies To Download On BitTorrent

div.a: This DeLorean Isn't A Time Machine, But It Is A Hovercraft

div.div: Watch as this DeLorean hovercraft plays by the Golden Gate Bridge.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UQK8et&via=Digg&text=This DeLorean Isn't A Time Machine, But It Is A Hovercraft

div.a: Jailbroken Kindle Emails Amazon's CEO Every Time A Bookmark Is Set

div.div: In a new performance piece he jailbroke his Kindle so that every time the Whispersync technology logs the data, it also sends an email to Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos with the same info, as well as publishing it online here.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10zv64u&via=Digg&text=Jailbroken Kindle Emails Amazon's CEO Every Time A Bookmark Is Set

div.a: Russia Is Recovering From An Enormous Hangover

div.div: You thought your New Year's hangover was bad? Russia's celebration last two full weeks, and chances are, you don't drink like the typical Russian.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZU6wFK&via=Digg&text=Russia Is Recovering From An Enormous Hangover

div.a: Esquire's Interview With Megan Fox Is the Worst Thing Ever Written

div.div: The cover story of this month's Esquire is an interview with Megan Fox by Stephen Marche. And, though I haven't read every single thing that has ever been written, I can say, with confidence, that it is the worst thing that anybody has ever written. Ever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V4BH0M&via=Digg&text=Esquire's Interview With Megan Fox Is the Worst Thing Ever Written
